name: Arche ch.1 ep4
description:
Hello, hello! Thank you for reading ch1.4!
This is the last episode for chapter one! Hurray! Next week, will be the start of chapter two where we will have some world building. The start of chapter two is one of my favourite episodes to draw, so please look forward to it!

I’ll see you guys next week!
Fei


Summary:
To prevent his elemental powers from being sealed before he graduates, Noah needed to do one thing, Summon a companion to aid him. What he did not expect is for his companion to be a demon. His professors are definitely going to fail him now.
